tool_description: cosmetic ingredients names korean , english data
name: cosmetic ingredients
title: cosmetic ingredients

api_list.name: Get all cosmetic  ingredients name
api_list.description:
This endpoint returns all Cosmetic  ingredients Name
화장품 성분명칭 전체 데이터를 불러옵니다.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cosmetic-ingredients2.p.rapidapi.com/cosmetic"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cosmetic-ingredients2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: cosmetic-ingredients id value
api_list.description:
cosmetic-ingredients name id value 
화장품 성분데이터의 명칭을 id 로 확인하여 불러옵니다.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cosmetic-ingredients2.p.rapidapi.com/cosmetic/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cosmetic-ingredients2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cosmetic-ingredients2.p.rapidapi.com/cosmetic/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cosmetic-ingredients2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
